sentence.Network_en: The temptation to recognize apomictic microspecies ( agamospecies ) as taxonomic species is far greater.
sentence.Network_cn: 把无融合生殖小种 ( 无性种 ) 作为分类学上的种来承认,这点具有更大的迷惑性.

sentence.Network_en: The occurrence of apomictic reproductive structures on the leaf of the bog orchid, is of interest.
sentence.Network_cn: 有趣的是在叶状沼兰叶子上发生无融合生殖的结构.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to a plant that reproduces by apomixis
2. (of reproduction) not involving the fusion of male and female gametes in reproduction
